nodes.text: Bolabo's Garage was a complex of docking and repair bays located deep within Byblos Starport Tower 214. The facility was hidden and kept secret from the Empire and was where Bolabo Hujaan and her team of outlaw techs retrofitted starships from starfighter to bulk transports.

The garage was a network of docking bays, storage rooms, and quarters for the employees. There were four docking bays which could handle a variety of ships and each bay had a repair facility attached to it. The storage bays were used to hold the various equipment used to fix and modify the ships, much of it illegal and smuggled onto Byblos. There was a small control room used by Hujaan to monitor traffic and update her records on the ships and captains that used her services. It had only one door and was locked with a code that only Hujaan knew. For defense, a hidden turbolasers was mounted between each docking bay.
